SEARCH
Package ru.bivchallenge.persistence

Class AbstractLocalDataProvider<T extends Entity>

java.lang.Object
ru.bivchallenge.persistence.AbstractLocalDataProvider<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity that extends Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataProvider<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompanyLocalProvider, LegalEntityLocalProvider, NaturalEntityLocalProvider
public abstract class AbstractLocalDataProvider<T extends Entity> extends Object implements DataProvider<T>
Abstract class providing the base implementation for loading data from CSV files and converting it into a map of entities.

    • AbstractLocalDataProvider

  • Method Details

    • getDataFromCsvTable

      protected Map<Long,T> getDataFromCsvTable(Path tablePath, Function<de.siegmar.fastcsv.reader.CsvRecord,T> parseFunction, BiFunction<String,T,T> repairFunction)
      Loads data from the specified CSV table, parses each record into an entity, and returns a map of entities identified by their unique IDs.

      This method also supports repairing entities based on a repair function if parsing fails.

      Parameters:
      tablePath - the path to the CSV file
      parseFunction - a function to parse each CsvRecord into an entity
      repairFunction - a function to repair an entity in case parsing fails, based on the first field value
      Returns:
      a map of entities, where the key is the entity ID, and the value is the entity itself
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error reading or processing the CSV file

    • getDataFromCsvTable

      protected Map<Long,T> getDataFromCsvTable(Path tablePath, Function<de.siegmar.fastcsv.reader.CsvRecord,T> parseFunction)
      Loads data from the specified CSV table and parses each record into an entity, returning a map of entities identified by their unique IDs.
      Parameters:
      tablePath - the path to the CSV file
      parseFunction - a function to parse each CsvRecord into an entity
      Returns:
      a map of entities, where the key is the entity ID, and the value is the entity itself
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error reading or processing the CSV file
